startProjectText:
Projects are made of "Frames" of information (text, images, maps) connected by links. 
To create a frame, hold down the "F" key and drag a rectangle on the screen. 

Frames can be linked by holding down the "C" key and clicking on two frames.
Or, click a frame then double-click a blank space on the map 
to create and link to a new Frame. 

Some Frames, such as images or maps, have links that target a specific spot on the frame.
Hold down the mouse to drag the start point of the link to the desired coordinate  
then click the target.  

To review this information, click "help" on the menu at the top-right corner of the screen.
